outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>What do you think? Is it <say-as interpret-as="characters">A</say-as> <break strength="medium" /> or <say-as interpret-as="characters">B</say-as> <break strength="medium" />  or <say-as interpret-as="characters">C</say-as> <break strength="medium" /> ?</speak>

<speak><s>Welcome to candidate quiz twenty sixteen. <break strength="medium" /></s>
<s>First question:</s>
<s>How many different countries did Hillary Clinton visit as Secretary of State?</s>
<s>Is it?</s>
<say-as interpret-as="characters">A</say-as> <break strength="medium" /> 112. <break strength="x-strong" /> <say-as interpret-as="characters">B</say-as> <break strength="medium" /> 17. <break strength="x-strong" /> <say-as interpret-as="characters">C</say-as> <break strength="medium" /> 43. <break strength="x-strong" /></speak>
